attributes.action: Maintain the price of Petrol & Derv to £0.99Litre by adjusting the Tax
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Maintain the price of Petrol & Derv to £0.99Litre by adjusting the Tax. This will cut the cost of living not only by the lower price of fuel but also the cost of food and other products with the reduced delivery costs.

rejection.details: There are many similar petitions, see http://search.petitions.pm.gov.uk/kbroker/number10/petitions/search.lsim?qt=fuel+tax&sr=0&nh=10&cs=&sc=number10&oq=qatada&sb=0&ha=1157&mt=0
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
